column4: ok can anybody tell me where i find ndiswrapper inside of ubuntu?
what are you tryin to do
get my wireless usb adapter to work
ok it says "could not find  package"
im on a laptop here and im on another machine with ubuntu that doesnt have wifi setup inside of ubuntu yet

you have to download the package http://packages.ubuntu.com/cgi-bin/download.pl?arch=all&file=pool%2Funiverse%2Fn%2Fndisgtk%2Fndisgtk_0.6-0ubuntu1_all.deb&md5sum=820f3a749abd2cb2d097c362103cd07e&arch=all&type=main
how do i do that with no net access on ubuntu machine?
transfer it using a usb key or floppy or somethin
you will also need to download the ndiswrapper package
it would be easier if you could hardwire to the internet as apt will automatically resolve depencies
